scripts.clean: # DOESN'T WORK ON WINDOWS -> pnpm recursive exec -- rm -rf node_modules; rm shrinkwrap.yaml; rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build: pnpm run build --filter shared && pnpm recursive run build
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV="development" pnpm recursive run start
scripts.be:start: cross-env NODE_ENV="development" pnpm recursive run start --filter back-end
scripts.be:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV="development" pnpm recursive run dev --filter back-end
scripts.fe:start: cross-env NODE_ENV="development" pnpm recursive run start --filter front-end
scripts.fe:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV="development" pnpm recursive run start --filter front-end
